channel.title: [TuT] Diablo 2 LOD Online FWEE!?
channel.description:
Still have that Diablo 2 w/ LOD Expansion CD in your drawer? I know I do. But it seems that my CD key is legit as something I can get off a serials website. Seems Battle Net won't sign in anymore. So I found this out and thought I should share.
Requirements: -Diablo 2 Game -Diablo 2 Lord Of Destruction Expansion Pack Game -Specs that remedy the D2's System Requirements.
Step 1: Install your game both D2 and LOD Expansion. Step 2: Download these Diablo 2 Files (http://www.mediafire.com/?nfuikhymzue) onto your computer extract with winRAR. Step 3: Update your Diablo 2 LOD to 1.13c located in downloaded folder. Step 4: Go to http://www.mundoblizz.com and scroll down till you see this:[URL=http://img156.imageshack.us/i/cah.png/][IMG]http://img156.imageshack.us/img156/4874/cah.th.png[/img][/URL] Type down info as to this is your login account. Step 5: Now go to the folder which you previously downloaded folder labeled D2Files, open up the program Gateway Editor. Step 6: Click on the D2 Tab. (Represented by the red box.) Click on Add (Represented by the Green Box.) And add this in: Name: [b]LagZero[/b] Address: [b]d2.lagzero.net[/b] [URL=http://img245.imageshack.us/i/cah2.png/][IMG]http://img245.imageshack.us/img245/5373/cah2.th.png[/img][/URL] Step 7: Open Diablo 2, goto change gateway and choose LagZero. Step 8: Use your Login Details to sign in. Enjoy!

item.title: [TuT] Diablo 2 LOD Online FWEE!?
item.dc:creator: @Erj Erj
item.description:
@Erj wrote:

the bank:

But it won’t be the battle.net servers and therefore much less players. Correct?

Sadly I think this is true. However I got a server up and averaged from 1-4 players joining in when I played for about an hour and a half. I don’t recommend PvP since its all scattered levels.

Read full topic

item.title: [TuT] Diablo 2 LOD Online FWEE!?
item.dc:creator: @Erj Erj
item.description:
@Erj wrote:

Still have that Diablo 2 w/ LOD Expansion CD in your drawer? I know I do. But it seems that my CD key is legit as something I can get off a serials website. Seems Battle Net won’t sign in anymore. So I found this out and thought I should share.

Requirements:
-Diablo 2 Game
-Diablo 2 Lord Of Destruction Expansion Pack Game
-Specs that remedy the D2’s System Requirements.

Step 1: Install your game both D2 and LOD Expansion.
Step 2: Download these Diablo 2 Files (http://www.mediafire.com/?nfuikhymzue) onto your computer extract with winRAR.
Step 3: Update your Diablo 2 LOD to 1.13c located in downloaded folder.
Step 4: Go to http://www.mundoblizz.com and scroll down till you see this: Type down info as to this is your login account.
Step 5: Now go to the folder which you previously downloaded folder labeled D2Files, open up the program Gateway Editor.
Step 6: Click on the D2 Tab. (Represented by the red box.) Click on Add (Represented by the Green Box.) And add this in:
Name: LagZero Address: d2.lagzero.net

Step 7: Open Diablo 2, goto change gateway and choose LagZero.
Step 8: Use your Login Details to sign in.
Enjoy!

Read full topic
